screenshot.caption: SPLINE file open in Spline

description: Spline is an online tool that 3D modelers can use to create 3D characters, scenes, product mockups, logos, and more. While Spline automatically saves the models that users create online, in their Spline cloud storage , users can also download the models they create as SPLINE files. This allows users to retain a local, backup copy of their Spline models.
To export a Spline model as a SPLINE file:
